results.name: a(n) gives the number of different powers m^n for which the sum of the digits is equal to m.
comment: Number of m >= 1 with m = sum of digits of m^n.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
xref: Cf. A124359, A152147 (table of m such that the sum of digits of m^n equals m)
results.author: _David W. Wilson_
ext: Examples provided by _Paolo P. Lava_, Oct 30 2006
